hero.title: Build Your Enterprise AI Memory Hub
hero.subtitle: Connect every knowledge point, build a growable enterprise knowledge graph. Let AI truly understand your business.

workspace.subtitle: Chat with AI assistant across your projects

workspace.noProjects: No projects available. Create a project first to use the AI agent.

advanced.title: Advanced Operations

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.desc: Delete this project and all its data, including memories, graph, and settings.
danger.confirm_prompt: This action cannot be recovered! Please enter the project name to confirm deletion:
danger.name_mismatch: Project name does not match, deletion cancelled.
danger.fail: Delete failed, please try again later.

messages.export_fail: Failed to export data, please try again.
messages.cache_fail: Failed to clear cache, please try again.
messages.rebuild_fail: Failed to rebuild communities, please try again.

strategy_tooltip.title: Search Strategy
strategy_tooltip.desc: Combines different search techniques like hybrid retrieval, cross-encoder reranking, and MMR for diversity.

focal_tooltip.title: Focal Node
focal_tooltip.desc: A specific node UUID to use as the center for node-distance reranking. Results closer to this node will rank higher.

filters.community_info: Enter a Community UUID in the search box to find all entities and episodes within that community.

placeholder.default: Search memories by keyword, concept, or ask a question...

errors.enter_start_uuid: Please enter a start entity UUID
errors.voice_not_supported: Voice search is not supported in this browser
errors.voice_failed: Voice search failed. Please try again.

communities.title: Communities
communities.subtitle: Automatically detected groups of related entities in the knowledge graph
communities.confirm_rebuild: This will rebuild all communities from scratch. This operation may take several minutes. The task will run in the background and you can track its progress here. Continue?

empty.title: No communities found
empty.desc: Add more episodes to enable community detection, or rebuild communities

detail.title: Community Details
detail.name: Name
detail.select_prompt: Select a community to view details
detail.click_prompt: Click on any community card to see its members

info.title: About Communities
info.desc: Communities are automatically detected groups of related entities using the Louvain algorithm. They help organize knowledge and reveal patterns in your data. Click "Rebuild Communities" to re-run the detection algorithm after adding new episodes.

entities.title: Project Entities
entities.subtitle: Explore and manage entities in the knowledge graph

detail.title: Entity Details
detail.name: Name
detail.click_prompt: Click on an entity from the list to view its details and relationships

maintenance.title: Graph Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: Monitor, maintain, and optimize the knowledge graph

refresh.title: Incremental Refresh
refresh.desc: Reprocess recent episodes and update graph without full rebuild

dedup.title: Deduplicate Entities
dedup.desc: Find and merge duplicate entities based on name similarity

clean.title: Clean Stale Edges
clean.desc: Remove relationships that haven't been updated in 30 days

rebuild.title: Rebuild Communities
rebuild.desc: Redetect communities using Louvain algorithm. Needed after major graph updates.

export.title: Export Data
export.desc: Download all graph data as JSON for backup or analysis

high_duplication.title: High duplication rate detected
high_duplication.desc: We found {{count}} potentially duplicate entities. Running 'Deduplicate Entities' is recommended.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.desc: Some operations like merging duplicates and cleaning edges cannot be undone. We recommend running 'Check' first to see what would be affected before executing.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.desc: View full product documentation and guides

api.title: API Reference
api.desc: Browse API endpoints and integration examples

error.connection: Failed to connect to task updates. Please check if the task completed.

placeholders.title: e.g. Q3 Strategy Meeting Notes
placeholders.content_intro: Initial thoughts on the upcoming quarter and resource allocation.
placeholders.content_list_2: Launch the Beta Feature set by mid-August
placeholders.content_quote: "The focus should remain on intelligent retrieval, not just storage."

editor.placeholder:
# Start typing your memory here...


You can use Markdown syntax to format your text.

- **Bold** key concepts
- Connect ideas with links

entities.subtitle: Define data models, attributes, and validation rules for the knowledge graph.

table.empty: No entity types defined yet. Click "Create Entity Type" to add one.
